scripts.test: pnpm run test:sdk-ts && pnpm run test:sdk-py
scripts.data:check-new-models:test: cd scripts/model-discovery && pnpm exec vitest run --config vitest.config.ts
scripts.validate:docs: pnpm run docs:links && pnpm run docs:build
scripts.validate:web: pnpm run web:lint && pnpm run web:build
scripts.validate:api: pnpm run api:lint && pnpm run api:build
scripts.packages:build:ts: pnpm --filter @ai-stats/devtools-core run build && cd packages/sdk/sdk-ts && pnpm run build
scripts.validate:packages: pnpm run packages:build:ts && pnpm run packages:pack:ts && pnpm run packages:build:py
scripts.openapi:lint: pnpm run openapi:normalize && spectral lint apps/docs/openapi/v1/openapi.yaml
scripts.oapi:gen: pnpm run openapi:normalize && pnpm run oapi:build && node packages/openapi/oapi-cli/dist/cli.js gen --spec apps/docs/openapi/v1/openapi.yaml
scripts.oapi:gen:ts: pnpm run openapi:normalize && pnpm run oapi:build && node packages/openapi/oapi-cli/dist/cli.js gen:ts --spec apps/docs/openapi/v1/openapi.yaml
scripts.oapi:gen:py: pnpm run openapi:normalize && pnpm run oapi:build && node packages/openapi/oapi-cli/dist/cli.js gen:py --spec apps/docs/openapi/v1/openapi.yaml
scripts.oapi:gen:go: pnpm run openapi:normalize && pnpm run oapi:build && node packages/openapi/oapi-cli/dist/cli.js gen:go --spec apps/docs/openapi/v1/openapi.yaml
scripts.oapi:gen:csharp: pnpm run openapi:normalize && pnpm run oapi:build && node packages/openapi/oapi-cli/dist/cli.js gen:csharp --spec apps/docs/openapi/v1/openapi.yaml
scripts.oapi:gen:php: pnpm run openapi:normalize && pnpm run oapi:build && node packages/openapi/oapi-cli/dist/cli.js gen:php --spec apps/docs/openapi/v1/openapi.yaml
scripts.oapi:gen:ruby: pnpm run openapi:normalize && pnpm run oapi:build && node packages/openapi/oapi-cli/dist/cli.js gen:ruby --spec apps/docs/openapi/v1/openapi.yaml
scripts.oapi:ir: pnpm run openapi:normalize && pnpm run oapi:build && node packages/openapi/oapi-cli/dist/cli.js ir --spec apps/docs/openapi/v1/openapi.yaml --out packages/openapi/oapi-cli/ir.json
scripts.openapi:gen: pnpm run openapi:gen:ts && pnpm run openapi:gen:py && pnpm run openapi:gen:go && pnpm run openapi:gen:csharp && pnpm run openapi:gen:php && pnpm run openapi:gen:ruby
scripts.changeset:version: pnpm exec changeset version && pnpm run sdk-py:sync-version
scripts.precommit: pnpm run lint && pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run build && pnpm run validate:data && pnpm run validate:pricing && pnpm run validate:gateway && pnpm run openapi:lint && pnpm run validate:docs && pnpm run validate:web && pnpm run validate:api && pnpm run validate:packages && (cd apps/web && pnpm run test) && pnpm run test
